entry.title: On distortion of a dichromatic image splitter
entry.content:
with rotation matrix that rotates towards left: $$ \begin{align} R = \begin{pmatrix} \cos\alpha & \sin\alpha
-\sin\alpha & \cos\alpha \end{pmatrix} \end{align} $$

``` common-lisp Generate Maxima Code to find the three parameters of a rigid transform (with-open-file (s “/dev/shm/optim.max” :direction :output :if-exists :supersede :if-does-not-exist :create) (format s “load(minpack)$~%”) (format s “g(p,tx,ty):=[”) (loop for (dist imdist iml imr lx ly x y) in cleaned-point-correspondence and i from 0 do (format s “cos(p)(~f)+sin(p)(~f)+tx-(~f), -sin(p)(~f)+cos(p)(~f)+ty-(~f)~c~%” x y lx x y ly (if (= i (1- (length cleaned-point-correspondence))) #\Space #\,))) (format s “];~%”) (format s “minpack_lsquares(g(p,tx,ty),[p,tx,ty],[.04,244.2,-0.7]);~%”))
